title: Ep 143 | What Really Happened When the 'Duck Dynasty' Cameras Stopped Rolling
description:
Phil, Jase, and Al reveal the true stories behind what you saw on "Duck Dynasty." Did the guys grow their beards just for TV? What's the truth behind those clean-shaven beach photos that gossip rags use to claim the Robertsons are fakes? How long did Jase have to sleep on the couch after putting mud on Missy? Does the family really know "Hacksaw" Jim Duggan? And will there ever be new episodes of "Duck Dynasty"? The behind-the-scenes Q&A starts at about 30:50. But first, Jase is pumped that teal season is here, and Phil and Al are baffled by elaborate gender reveals.
